MAIN.DESCRIPTION: The ATT&CK Navigator is a web-based tool for annotating and exploring ATT&CK matrices. It can be used to visualize defensive coverage, red/blue team planning, the frequency of detected techniques, and more.

LAYER.EXPORT_VISIBLE_ONLY_LABEL: Only download annotations on visible techniques

TECHNIQUE.LINK_TOOLTIP_DISABLED: cannot edit links on selected techniques with differing links
TECHNIQUE.METADATA_TOOLTIP_DISABLED: cannot edit metadata on selected techniques with differing metadata

LAYER_UPGRADE.TITLE: Layer Upgrade
LAYER_UPGRADE.DESCRIPTION: Review techniques which have been added, changed, replaced, or removed from the knowledge base since ATT&CK v{{fromVersion}} and update your Navigator layer to reflect these changes.
LAYER_UPGRADE.DND_TOOLTIP: Drag and drop to copy annotations to the desired tactics in ATT&CK v{{version}}.

TABS.SAFARI_WARNING_P1: We have detected that you are using the Safari browser. As of Navigator version 4.3, Safari versions 13 and below are not supported due to an unfixable freeze that can occur when selecting a layer tab.
TABS.SAFARI_WARNING_P2: We recommend you use Chrome or Firefox instead. You can continue to use the Navigator in Safari (versions 13 and below), but you may lose work if the application freezes.
TABS.VERSION_WARNING_TEXT1: The uploaded layer version ({{objVersion}}) does not match Navigator's layer version ({{globalVersion}}). The layer configuration may not be fully restored.
TABS.VERSION_WARNING_TEXT2: View the latest Layer File Format specification and the changelog for more information:
TABS.VERSION_NOTE: *Note: ATT&CK Versions prior to v{{minVersion}} are not supported by Navigator v{{navVersion}}.
TABS.OPEN_LAYER_PANEL_DESC: Load a layer from your computer or a URL
TABS.CREATE_FROM_OTHER_DESC: Select layers to inherit properties from
TABS.CUSTOM_NAV_DESC: Create a hyperlink to a customized ATT&CK Navigator
TABS.DEFAULT_LAYERS_INFO: Enter the URLs of layers hosted on the web. The custom navigator will open these layers by default.
TABS.DOMAIN_HELP: Select the domain for the new layer. Only layers of the same domain and version can be merged.
TABS.SCORE_EXPRESSION_INTRO: Use constants (numbers) and layer variables (highlighted in yellow above) to write an expression for the initial value of scores in the new layer.
TABS.SCORE_EXPRESSION_OPS_INTRO: A full list of supported operations can be found
TABS.SCORE_EXPRESSION_BLANK_INFO: . Leave blank to initialize scores to 0.
TABS.SCORE_EXPRESSION_VARS_INTRO: Here is a list of available layer variables:
TABS.GRADIENT_HELP: Select which layer to import the scoring gradient from. Leave blank to initialize with the default scoring gradient.
TABS.COLORING_HELP: Select which layer to import manually assigned colors from. Leave blank to initialize with no colors.
TABS.COMMENTS_HELP: Select which layer to import comments from. Leave blank to initialize with no comments.
TABS.LINKS_HELP: Select which layer to import technique links from. Leave blank to initialize without links.
TABS.METADATA_HELP: Select which layer to import technique metadata from. Leave blank to initialize without metadata.
TABS.STATES_HELP: Select which layer to import enabled/disabled states from. Leave blank to initialize all to enabled.
TABS.FILTERS_HELP: Select which layer to import filters from. Leave blank to initialize with no filters.
TABS.LEGEND_HELP: Select which layer to import the legend from. Leave blank to initialize with an empty legend.

multiselect.LABEL: Multiselect panel
multiselect.DESC: Disable to remove the multiselect panel from the interface.

export_render.LABEL: Render layer button
export_render.DESC: Disable to remove the button to render the current layer.

export_excel.LABEL: Export to Excel button
export_excel.DESC: Disable to remove the button to export the current layer to MS Excel (.xlsx) format.

legend.LABEL: Legend panel
legend.DESC: Disable to remove the legend panel from the interface.

background_color.LABEL: Background color effect
background_color.DESC: Disable to remove the background color effect on manually assigned colors.

non_aggregate_score_color.LABEL: Non-aggregate score colors
non_aggregate_score_color.DESC: Disable to remove the color effect on non-aggregate scores.

aggregate_score_color.LABEL: Aggregate score colors
aggregate_score_color.DESC: Disable to remove the color effect on aggregate scores.

comment_underline.LABEL: Comment underline
comment_underline.DESC: Disable to remove the comment underline effect on techniques.

metadata_underline.LABEL: Metadata underline
metadata_underline.DESC: Disable to remove the metadata underline effect on techniques.

link_underline.LABEL: Link underline
link_underline.DESC: Disable to remove the hyperlink underline effect on techniques.

leave_site_dialog.LABEL: Leave site dialog
leave_site_dialog.DESC: Disable to remove the dialog prompt when leaving the site.

tabs.LABEL: Tabs
tabs.DESC: Disable to remove the ability to open new tabs.

header.LABEL: Header
header.DESC: Disable to remove the header containing the banner.

selection_controls.LABEL: Selection controls
selection_controls.DESC: Disable to disable all subfeatures under selection controls.

search.LABEL: Search & multiselect
search.DESC: Disable to remove the technique search panel from the interface.

deselect_all.LABEL: Deselect techniques
deselect_all.DESC: Disable to remove the deselect-all button from the interface.

selecting_techniques.LABEL: Selection behavior
selecting_techniques.DESC: Disable to remove the ability to select techniques.

layer_controls.LABEL: Layer controls
layer_controls.DESC: Disable to disable all subfeatures under layer controls.

layer_settings.LABEL: Layer settings
layer_settings.DESC: Disable to remove the layer info panel (name, description, and metadata). The layer can still be renamed in the tab.

download_layer.LABEL: Export
download_layer.DESC: Disable to remove the button to download the layer.

filters.LABEL: Filters
filters.DESC: Disable to remove the filters panel from the interface.

sorting.LABEL: Sorting
sorting.DESC: Disable to remove the sorting button from the interface.

color_setup.LABEL: Color setup
color_setup.DESC: Disable to remove the color setup panel, including controls for the scoring gradient and tactic row colors.

toggle_hide_disabled.LABEL: Show/hide disabled
toggle_hide_disabled.DESC: Disable to remove the hide-disabled-techniques button from the interface.

subtechniques.LABEL: Sub-techniques
subtechniques.DESC: Disable to remove all sub-technique features from the interface.

technique_controls.LABEL: Technique controls
technique_controls.DESC: Disable to disable all subfeatures under technique controls.

disable_techniques.LABEL: Toggle state
disable_techniques.DESC: Disable to remove the ability to disable techniques.

manual_color.LABEL: Background color
manual_color.DESC: Disable to remove the ability to assign manual colors to techniques.

scoring.LABEL: Scoring
scoring.DESC: Disable to remove the ability to score techniques.

comments.LABEL: Comments
comments.DESC: Disable to remove the ability to add comments to techniques.

links.LABEL: Links
links.DESC: Disable to remove the ability to assign hyperlinks to techniques.

metadata.LABEL: Metadata
metadata.DESC: Disable to remove the ability to add metadata to techniques.

clear_annotations.LABEL: Clear annotations on selected
clear_annotations.DESC: Disable to remove the button to clear all annotations on the selected techniques.

toolbar_controls.LABEL: Toolbar controls
toolbar_controls.DESC: Disable to disable all subfeatures under toolbar controls.

sticky_toolbar.LABEL: Sticky toolbar toggle
sticky_toolbar.DESC: Disable to remove the ability to enable or disable the sticky toolbar.

SVG_EXPORT.IE_WARNING: Warning: this interface is not fully compatible with your browser. For best results please switch to Edge, Chrome, or Firefox.
